blockentity.essence.essence_station.name: Essence Station
world.essence.needs_lightning_water: All adjacent blocks need to be lightning water blocks!
death.attack.shocked: %1$s tried to swim for too long in lightning water!
tooltip.essence.lightning_summoner.toolt: Right click on a waterlogged lighting rod to create lightning water
Right clicking on a spawner will break the block with a chance to get spawner shards
jei.essence.spawner_shard: These shards can be collected by right clicking a on a spawner with a spawner shard extractor.
jei.essence.spawner_shard_extractor: When right clicked on a spawner the spawner will break and drop experience, sometimes spawner shards will drop too.
jei.essence.lightning_water_block: By using a lightning summoner on a waterlogged lightning rod you can create lightning water.
jei.essence.activated_spawner_shard: These shards can be used to make spawn eggs.
jei.essence.essence_upgrader: Right click on basic and advanced mob and ore essence blocks to get the next tier of essence. Basic -> Advanced -> Elite.
jei.essence.essence_converter: Right click on a ore essence block to convert it to a mob essence block. Works both ways.
jei.essence.basic_mob_essence: Has a chance to drop from any mob.
jei.essence.advanced_mob_essence: By placing a basic mob essence block in a pool of lightning water and using a upgrading catalyst on it you can get this essence.
jei.essence.advanced_ore_essence: By placing a basic ore essence block in a pool of lightning water and using a upgrading catalyst on it you can get this essence.
jei.essence.elite_mob_essence: By placing a advanced mob essence block in a pool of lightning water and using a upgrading catalyst on it you can get this essence.
jei.essence.elite_ore_essence: By placing a advanced ore essence block in a pool of lightning water and using a upgrading catalyst on it you can get this essence.
